languages.text: "В знак своего расположения я отдам тебе твоих боевых невольников. Они забрели в логово, пока я тебя кроил, и назвались твоими телохранителями".
"As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."
languages.original_text: "В знак своего расположения я отдам тебе твоих боевых невольников. Они забрели в логово, пока я тебя кроил, и назвались твоими телохранителями".

traits.locale_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."
"As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."
"As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."
"As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

languages.text: “作为我的青睐，我会把你的奴隶战士们还给你。这群人在我为你疗伤的时候闯了进来，自称是你的保镖。”
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: “作为我的青睐，我会把你的奴隶战士们还给你。这群人在我为你疗伤的时候闯了进来，自称是你的保镖。”

languages.text: «Como muestra de mi favor, te devuelvo a tus sirvientes de combate. Entraron en la guarida mientras estaba tratándote y afirmaron que eran tus guardaespaldas».
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: «Como muestra de mi favor, te devuelvo a tus sirvientes de combate. Entraron en la guarida mientras estaba tratándote y afirmaron que eran tus guardaespaldas».

languages.text: 「せめてもの情けとして、奴隷戦士に同行させよう。貴様を手当てしている間に我々の住処に迷い込んできて、貴様の用心棒だと言っていた」「
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: 「せめてもの情けとして、奴隷戦士に同行させよう。貴様を手当てしている間に我々の住処に迷い込んできて、貴様の用心棒だと言っていた」「

languages.text: "Als Zeichen meiner Gunst gebe ich Euch Eure Sklavenkämpfer. Sie sind in mein Versteck gekommen, während ich Euch geheilt habe, und haben sich als Eure Leibwache vorgestellt."
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: "Als Zeichen meiner Gunst gebe ich Euch Eure Sklavenkämpfer. Sie sind in mein Versteck gekommen, während ich Euch geheilt habe, und haben sich als Eure Leibwache vorgestellt."

languages.text: « En signe de ma faveur, je vous ferai don de combattants esclaves. Ils se sont aventurés dans l'antre pendant que je vous soignais, en affirmant être vos gardes du corps. »
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: « En signe de ma faveur, je vous ferai don de combattants esclaves. Ils se sont aventurés dans l'antre pendant que je vous soignais, en affirmant être vos gardes du corps. »

languages.text: "İyi niyetimi göstermek için savaşçı kölelerini yanına vereceğim. Yaralarınla ilgileniyorduk ki mekâna dalıp muhafızın olduklarını söylediler."
languages.original_text: "As a sign of my favour, I'll give you your slave fighters. They wandered into the den while I was healing you, and called themselves your bodyguards."

traits.locale_text: "İyi niyetimi göstermek için savaşçı kölelerini yanına vereceğim. Yaralarınla ilgileniyorduk ki mekâna dalıp muhafızın olduklarını söylediler."
